name: Cb48
tagline: Archival repository for work  editing the manuscript Codex Bodmer 48
body:
#cb48#

We're creating a digital diplomatic edition of the text of Chaucer's *Canterbury Tales* in the 
fifteenth-century manuscript Codex Bodmer 48.

See our wiki for further information and links to resources for project participants.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
